Brooklyn Pennant Ale '55 v0.2

05 Jan 2014

This is a clone of Brooklyn Pennant Ale pale ale from the book [CloneBrews: Homebrew Recipes for 150 Commercial Beers][book].

This is v0.2 of this clone. Made v0.1 on 2013-05-27. There are some definite differences from v0.1 of this recipe - I forgot to get the extra few...

Cascadian IPA

16 Jun 2013

From here. Original recipe called it a Cascadian Dark Ale.

Ingredients

Grains
  • 11 lb American 2-Row (original called for 10, I upped by 1 lb. as heard grinder at store not too good)
  • 2 lb Munich I
  • 1 lb Carafa III malt
  • 0.5 lb Crystal 120
    • ...
